summary: WebWaka Marketing Website Rebuild - Frontend Testing Complete. All routes work correctly, CTAs route to correct destinations, no 'eMarketWaka' references found, WebWaka platform positioning is correct.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: Homepage navigation was missing 'About' link - added to match marketing layout
context_for_next_testing_agent: WebWaka marketing website rebuild complete. All 8 routes tested: /, /platform, /suites, /solutions, /partners, /impact, /about, /contact. All CTAs route correctly: 'Get Started' -> /signup-v2, 'Become a Partner' -> /partners. No 'eMarketWaka' references found. WebWaka positioned as 'platform' not 'app/marketplace/POS'. Commerce Suite marked as 'Active', others as 'Coming Soon'. Green color scheme used throughout. Phone+OTP signup flow at /signup-v2 (Nigeria-first design).

checks: Navigation links: Platform, Suites, Solutions, Partners, Impact, About
Footer has correct links and branding
All 6 industry suites displayed (Commerce active, others Coming Soon)
All 6 suites displayed: Commerce, Education, Health, Civic, Hospitality, Logistics

mocked_apis_list: OTP service is mocked (logs to console) - for authentication flow, not marketing website
